name: Custom Browser Automation Agent
description: A powerful browser automation agent with multi-provider LLM fallback, vision capabilities, and live screenshot streaming. Can navigate websites, interact with elements, extract information, and stream real-time browser activity.

endpoints.description: Execute any browser automation task with live streaming. Use this to: navigate to ANY URL (including localhost endpoints like http://localhost:8090/health for health checks), search websites, click elements, fill forms, extract data from web pages, take screenshots, and interact with any web-based interface. Supports real-time screenshot streaming to canvas. Examples: 'Go to leetcode.com and find contests', 'Navigate to http://localhost:8000/docs and show the API', 'Search Amazon for headphones and find the cheapest'.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: Natural language task description for the browser agent. Be specific about the URL and what to do.

parameters.name: max_steps
parameters.description: Maximum number of steps to execute (default: 10).

parameters.name: extract_data
parameters.description: Whether to extract structured data from the page (default: False).
